@use JSDoc

@returns

Table of Contents

  • Synonyms
  • Syntax
  • Overview
  • Examples
  • Related Links

Synonyms

@return

Syntax

@returns [{type}] [description]

Overview

The @returns tag documents the value that a function returns.

If you are documenting a generator function, use the @yields tag instead of this tag.

Examples

  • @yields
